name: Perished World Merchant
description:
You play as Red "the Merchant" Hunter, who has to explore a desolate world looking for supplies to use and sell to travelers so that they can follow their journeys and complete their quests. Every trade that you lose means that the chances of that buyer coming back is low. So is up to you to find what they want and to sell at whatever price you want.

  • Open World for you to explore.
  • Day & Night cycle that affect the behavior of your enemies.
  • Watch your meters so you don't get Thirsty, Hungry or Tired.
  • Characters will react differently based in your actions, such as talking with them while a gun is equipped.
  • Any NPC can be killed.
  • 5 Endings

System Requirements:

  • CPU: Intel Core i3 or better
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • VIDEO CARD: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • FREE DISK SPACE: 700 Mb
  • DISPLAY: 1280x768 or better

Perished World Merchant

Game developed in RPG Maker MV.
